text: eya liya kiyawa ganima obata bharaya.
menna giyak kurutu gala...

pruthugalaye supiri papandu kridaka kristiyane ronaldo , kroeshiyawe luka modrich ha eejipthuwe mohomad sala ema sammana uleledi pirinamana wasare papandu kridakayata himi sammanaya sandaha nirdesha wu awasan kridakayin thidena lesa nam kara athi bawa antharjathika papandu sammelanaya eeye nila washayen niwedanaya kale ya.

wisheshayen fesbuk adawiye sarisarana kollan kellan ha samaja ka්riyakarikayan athara me gana wiwidha sanwada sidu wuna.
mathiwarana komisama kiyanne eeke sabhapathita da ehemath nathnam ara hulta da ehema wenna bari bawa apa dannawa
mawa ranjani ruhunuge mahathmiyayi.
handiye petral shed ekak athi kiyala mama hithanawa..
kathuwarunge awasaraya labanogaththe mandayi mama ohugen asa sitiya.
eya noladahoth, 44 ‘mama nikma aa mage gedarata perala yami’yi kiyayi.

jathika aapada kalamanakarana madhyasthanaya 1996 di samaja sewa saha samaja shubhasadhana amathyanshaya yatathe pihituwana ladi. 2005/12/08 wani dina anka 1422/22 darana athi wishesha gasat niwedanaya magin aapada sahana sewa amathyanshaya yatathata path karana ladde sahana katayuthu punaruththapana katayuthu saha prathisanskarana katayuthu salasum kota kriyathmaka kala haki wanu pinisa ya.
ape aachchi nam kiyanne rana kumbaal gewal kadapuhama bade amaru hadenawayi kiyala.
owun bedi yanne nathiwa rate awashyathawa wenuwen eka apekshakayekwa dinawannata wada karanawa.
polowe kisi deyak wawenne na dan- katu kohol witharayi wawenne- thama thamanwa mara gena kanna tharam badaginne minissu inne.
naththan api dada kanawa.
bartol bresht wisin rachana kota adhyakshanaya karana…
mul awasthawe niwaradi prathikarayan nolada hoth thunatiya paththata yame thaththwayan athi we.
parampara gatha depala wasi himiwe.
ithin lamayi oyala monawada dakka waradi giya para kampen ekedi.
elawalu gowi gataluwa gana janapathi niyamayen sakachchawak
sinhala bauddhayanta aluth adahas idiri kirimata nohaki bawa kiyana siwala mahatha ithin anith ayata wilar wakyaya gana matha prakasha karanna yayi illanne ohuta mathayak nathi bawa wasa ganimata da?
mese boho duk gahata windimin ape athitha muthun miththan apata raka di aththe mihindu maharahathan wahanse dayada kala me budu sasunaya.

ithin me awasthawe hitiwana kiwi kihipayak kiyanna awasarayi.(kawuruth kan wahaganna nam epa)ude idan hama damath bas yanawawihilu thahalu mada tika tika gawenawawadimada tika wapage ginumata bara wenawamuwin nobani wapath bas eke yanawa.gugal ge maha gedarath giya bas kollochinuth ekka bas paddeth ape kolloblog sathiyakuth karapu ape bas kollodinen dinama idiriyata pala bas kollo
shri lanka podujana peramune ha shrilanka nidahas pakshaye nayakayan athara pawathi sakachcha warawaladi awastha gananawakadima me pilibandawa dirghawa sakachcha kara athi bawada wartha we.
habayi oyalata kathawe dakinna labeyi fitsgen labunu paniwidayak.
mahathwaru eseya..dadaballan meseya..
ehema thiyeddi dolarayayi, rupiyalayi gana kawara katha da?”
budu himiyan palamuwarata wadi awasthawe methana thabu pa salakunu thamayi ee kada binda dama thibenne kiyalayi wishwasa karanne.

mewara ohu ge nirmanakshiya yomuwuye wesethuru siritha wethataya bale pembara konda bandath dekane puskola thodu thibuwath mal yahan kawi udesa wayena berapada ha meki nada malawa da garayak natume kawi thalaya da musukarawa mehi gi hanga mathukarawaganu laba thibe sangithacharya ostin munasinha wetha labunu thewani pathwima siduwuye 1983 wasaredi kollupitiye mahanama maha widuhalataya ehidi ohu ge karya bharyaya wadath pupal lesa itukaragannata awasthawa salasune ehi ewakata widuhalpathi ke em da silwa mahatha ge da nomada sahayogaya labimeni mahanama pasal githaye pada rachakaya widuhalpathi ke pi da silwa lesath thanu nirmapakaya ostin munasinha lesath satahan wi thibe ehi uda guru sisu hamuwe sampradayika nyaya pathrayata anuwa wayena jathika giye saha pasal giye wadya wrundaye sarpinawa siyathinma wayuwe sangithacharyawaraya lesa eya siya wagakima lesa salakamini wasara pura ehi sisun samastha lanka mattamin ha wenath sangitha tharaga sandaha sudanam kirima ehi pawathwena wenath uthsawa saha raswim hi sangitha katayuthu meheyawima aadi meki noki wagakim rashiyak siya uramathata gena katayuthu kirimata ohuta siduwiya yam aarthika apahasutha saha asirutha athi sisun kerehi pithruthwaya kati wu dayaparawasha hagimen katayuthu karamin haki sama witama siya paudgalika mudalin owun hata udaw upakara karannata kisiwitaka nopakili wiya kala ulela saha wenath katayuthu sandaha gomman andura watena thuru thama ha randi sisun ge wiyahiyadam sapura demawpiyan amatha owun aarakshithawa siya niwas kara pitath kara harinnata katayuthu kaleya siya sisun thaman wethin paudgalika adhyapanaya hadarimata yomuwima pilikew kala munasinhayan samawitama kiya sitiye eya sadacharathmana nowana bawath thama yuthukama uparimawa pasala thuladi itukarana bawathya siya sisu daruwanta wetha kerena kenehilikam asadharanakam hamu we eeta wirodhaya pa dadi lesa sanwedi wu ohu usas pela prayogika parikshanayata muhuna dun sisuwaku ta siduwu akatayuththakadi eeta madihath wi eya waha niwaradi kaleya adala parikshanayedi bahira parikshakaya hamuwe itha niwaradiwa susara karagath wayalinayak manahara lesa wayana sisuwekuge wadanayata mahath aashawen sawan di siti ohuta eelaga mohothe asannata labune mewani niyogayaki ooka hariyata tiyun karagena na ...........mehe aran enawa ooka......................

apa yatath wijithawadaye grahanayen midi laba gath nidahasa saba lesin arthawath wanu aththe ebandu purawasi kriyakarithwayak thulin apa kawada ho sakshath kara ganimata ida athi niwahal samuhika aachara dharmiya uuruwak waga kara ganimen pamani.

ehema nathnam umbaa ugen “bandara ee dawaswala mara badu kirillak neda kiruwe” kiyala ahannada mathakaye parana dewal randila thiyena eka api umbaalage waraddakda kiyala hithenawa ban me wage sin unama.

ape paththeth aami koki warayek innawa...api issara rata wate giya 50 - 60 trip walata eyawa thamayi ekkagena yanne...aaye lunu balili arawa mewa na wanshot hamadeyakma...payakin uyala iwarayi....waw malu ekak hadanawa malayo....mathak weddi katata kela unanawa...

ee nisa apita ee layisthuwen tharaga karanna baha.
dan manawa himikam aarakshakayo yanuwen kandayamda bihi wi siti.

adala karmantha shalawen mema siddhiya athiwimata pera sitama 112 denekuge pamana kandayamak sewayen iwath kara athi bawata sakshi labi athi heyin mema sewakayan iwath kirima nisa owungen yam kotasak ho mema siddhiya pitupasa sitina bawa ho, yam balawegayak mema gataluwa uthsanna kirimata katayuthu kale da yanna pilibanda polisiya parikshana pawathwana bawa danwanu kamaththemi.paniya jala prashnayata danatamath thawakalika wisandum labadi athi bawada, ee sandaha thirasara wisandum labadimata kalaka sitama katayuthu aarambha kara athi bawada mema sabhawata danwami.

janadhipathi karyala prakashakaya sandahan kala aakarayata, kabinat mandalaya diwurum dimata dina dekakata pera janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahathage nila niwasata ejapa niyojithayan lesa agamathi ranil wikramasinha, rajitha senarathna, malik samarawikrama, ranjith madduma bandara yana pirisa pamina thibe.

buddhimaya samanathmathawaya sabawinma sparshya nam aprikawa (saha aprikanu dayasporawa) mathabhedathmaka karana sambandhayen (palamu manawa shishtacharaye aprikanu sambhawaya wani) wiya yuthu nisa oba pawasana de bhayanaka ya.
godak dewal ee ayata karaganna puluwan.
namuth bahutharayak  mema rogayata goduru wiya hakiya .
samastha bandhanagara paddhathiya thulama wuye sirakaruwa pelana niladhari thrasthawadayak kriyathmaka apagatha thaththwayaki.
adhyayana katayuthu sarthakawa karagena giyada aya niwasiyanta hora rahase prema sambandhathawak pawathwagena giyaya.
hruda peshi patakayanta rudhiraya sapayana wenama rudhira nala paddhathiyakda thibe.
lankaramaya thula wata da geya, bodhi gharaya, pohoya geya, pilimageya ha sima prakaraya aadiya thibima nisa eya abhayagiriye swadhina aayathanayak lesa thibunu bawa wishwasa kere.
kanna denawa thamayi.
mamath horen pita wela panthi giya.
amila plan eka kiwwa.
kawuru hari amaru prashnayak ahuwoth kament blok karanawa.
ee minis aragalayata mama hisa namanawa!
chikeyiya ane wanitha katayuthu amathiniyakata dunna nam hari.
hirubasina sonduru sadawaka
polonnaruwe natambaun walata kochchara uthsaha kalath
mun denna randu karanawa dakina kota mata harima sathutuyi.
“oba siyalla athaharinna.
sithehi thibena kopaya nopenwamin kariyawasam pawasuweya..
ehema wunoth honda tharagayak apita laba denna puluwan.”
namuth appachchige mannaya,nambuwa kula mala wala tharam dana danama me sarasi aalaya maga ariye loku akkawa sihiwiya.
api ee widiyata karamu..
ammo ow, hondata gutikala thiyenawa.
kiyannako balanna ehenan…"
:pa suba pathum elata liyanta !!

wijesiri, siripala radampala gamagegitha - bolan nanandi wayamu sural – je. ee. miltan perera saha pirisa samanola sihina yuga datha – marwin perera, latha walpola nalu niliyan -robin pranandu, soniya disanayaka, jenita samarawira, somi rathnayaka, upali aththanayaka, marwin jayathunga, shanthi lekha, bi. as. perera, don sirisena, jagath rohan, wilsan karunarathna, parl wasudewi, denawaka hamine, wijerathna warakagoda, rathnawali kakunawela, shrima kodikara, senarath mapitigama, sitha kumari, shriya kalubowila, aariyadasa satharasinha, lil ramanayaka, pushpakanthi akmimana, tedi widyalankaraaarambhaka sinama shala - krawun – maradana, manel – dematagoda, roksi - wallawaththa, kuwinlan – nugegoda, raj – migamuwa, pablikhol - gampaha, kuwinlan – galla, oodiyan – mahanuwara, niwsinama - kurunagala, chaya - kagalla, chandra - awissawella, chithra - kalutharakarate jothiragatha wu dinaya – 1983 mayi 06 idiripath kirima - simasahitha dulmini chithrapata sama nishpadanaya - dosthara pi.
